TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象将传递到事件的任何事件处理程序。 The object is passed to any event handler for the event. 属性包含要插入的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted. 在数据源中执行插入操作之前, 可以使用对象来检查数据。You can use the object to examine the data before the insert operation is executed in the data source. 然后, 您可以对数据进行验证, 检查数据类中的验证错误, 或在更新之前更改值。You can then validate the data, examine validation errors from the data class, or change a value before the update. 您还可以取消插入操作。You can also cancel the insert operation. 如果表示数据源的对象在插入数据之前引发验证异常, 则该属性将包含类的实例。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it inserts the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 您可以通过属性检索所有验证异常。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果未引发验证异常, 则属性将包含`null`。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果处理验证异常并且不希望重新引发异常, 请将属性设置为。 `true`If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的处理程序。The following example shows a handler for the event. 该属性中的对象将强制转换为一个名`Product`为的类型。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `Product`对象`DateModified`的属性设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用控件显示任何验证异常消息。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

summary.span: 获取在执行插入操作之前验证数据时引发的异常。

span.span: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the insert operation.

value.span: 如果发生错误，则为该异常；否则为 。

span.span: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果在执行插入操作之前引发验证异常, 则该异常将存储在属性中。If a validation exception is thrown before the insert operation is performed, the exception is stored in the property. 在事件的处理程序中, 可以通过属性检索异常。In a handler for the event, you can retrieve the exception through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的处理程序。The following example shows a handler for the event. 它通过使用控件显示任何验证异常消息。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示异常是否已得到处理而不该再次引发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果异常已得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以为事件创建事件处理程序, 以检查在插入操作之前发生的验证异常。You can create event handlers for the event to examine validation exceptions that occurred before the insert operation. 如果处理异常, 而不希望再次引发异常, 则将属性设置为。 `true`If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果未将属性设置为`true`, 则异常将传播到调用堆栈中的下一个事件处理程序。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它通过使用控件显示任何验证异常消息。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Inserting(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message + "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Inserting(object sender, LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the data to insert.

value.span: 包含要插入数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the data to insert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含将插入数据源的数据。The property contains the data that will be inserted into the data source. 为事件创建处理程序并检索属性, 以便在执行数据操作之前验证数据、更改数据或取消插入操作。Create a handler for the event and retrieve the property in order to validate the data, change the data, or cancel the insert operation before the data operation is executed. 属性返回类型的对象。 The property returns an object of type . 可以将此对象强制转换为表示数据的类的类型。You can cast this object to the type of the class that represents the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的处理程序。The following example shows a handler for the event. 该属性中的对象将强制转换为一个名`Product`为的类型。The object from the property is cast to a type named `Product`. `Product`对象`DateModified`的属性设置为当前日期和时间。The `DateModified` property of the `Product` object is set to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
